result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael T. Rud

records.addlTxt: Plea hearing on December 6, 2022 at 09:30 am.

11:00 AM Cases called: 21CF1295 & 22CF151. Defendant Michael T. Rud in court.  Attorney Zebulon Patek in court for Michael T. Rud.  Attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. This is the date and time for a status conference. The parties do have an agreement that includes a mandatory report to jail. Defendant has some current medical issues that would make it difficult to report today. Defense requests a 30 day adjournment.
Plea Hearing: 12/06/22 at 9:30am 15 min in person.
Status conference on November 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.

1:45 PM cases 21CF1295, 22CF151 called. Attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Michael T. Rud in court with Attorney Zebulon Patek.
Defense request another date for status conference. 

Status Conference set for 11/01/2022 at 11:00 AM
Status conference on September 26, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

Cases called at 11:19 AM: 21CF1295, 22CF151.
Defendant Michael T. Rud in court with Attorney Zebulon Patek.   Attorney Robert Stoiber  in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas.  Court grants 20 days for the filing of motions.
Attorney Patek indicates that he may be filing a motion and requests to schedule further with the Br 2 judicial assistant.
Br 2 to schedule Motion Hearing and/ or STC.
Arraignment on September 6, 2022 at 11:15 am.

9:53 AM 21CF1295 & 22CF151.Prosecuting attorney Afton Brianna Lewis in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael T. Rud in court.  Attorney Zebulon Patek in court for Michael T. Rud. Warrant quashed. Cases referred to Br. 2 for arraignment.
Notice of Pretrial Monitoring Program Termination

(Cases 21CF1295, 22CF151 are called at 9:00 AM) Defendant Michael T. Rud not in court or by Zoom.  Attorney Alicia Linzmeier for Attorney Zebulon Patek in court for Michael T. Rud. Deputy District Attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. 
No information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance. State requests warrant. 
Warrant ordered.
Same as the Criminal Complaint
Arraignment on June 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.

(10:15 AM cases 21CF1295, 22CF151 called.) Prosecuting attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Michael T. Rud in court. Attorney Zebulon Patek in court for Michael T. Rud. 
Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing in cases 21CF1295, 22CF151 and Court accepts waivers.
Attorney Patek to schedule Arraignments with the Branch 2 Judicial Assistant.

10:07 AM Cases called: 21CF1295 & 22CF151. Prosecuting attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael T. Rud in court.  Attorney Zebulon Patek in court for Michael T. Rud. Defense is waiting on global offer. PTC: 04/11/22 at 3pm.
Hearing scheduled for May 3, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Hearing on May 3, 2022 at 09:30 am.
